# Government Tender Announcement for Programmer/Software Developers

## Title

* English: Two (2) Programmer/Software Developers - Level 3 for SampleManager LIMS
* French: Deux (2) Programmeur / Rédacteur de logiciels - Niveau 3 pour SistemManager LIMS

## Reference Number
* cb-500-17345580

## Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: November 29, 2024, 16:00:00 GST
* Expecte Contract Start Date: December 16, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2027

## Description of Work
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the services of two (2) Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers with expertise in SampleManager implementation and support.

## Conditions of the Contract

* Competitive - Selective Tendering Method
* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others

## Region of Operation
* Canada

## Regions of Delivery
* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity
* Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)

## Contracting Entity Address
* 59 Camden Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0Y9

## Contact Information
* Peter Vinh, peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca, (343) 573-4194

[Links to the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) in English and French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/full/tender_notice/51602/2024-00509b---tbips-npp.pdf) (English)

[Links to the Avis de projet de marché (APM) in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51602/2024-00509b---apm-fra.pdf) (French)
